transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (before the movie) Only ten seconds! I only get ten seconds to tell people about my interview with Jim Carrey after the movie? What? We're on now? Uh, Space Ghost, Jim Carrey, right after the movie!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (watching film trailer on monitor) Did you see that dog?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That dog was great!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: He was good.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: How do you suppose they got... Oh, hi everyone, I'm Space Ghost. We just saw "The Mask" with Jim Carrey.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It was funny.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure was! I have a new talk show on the Cartoon Network, called "Space Ghost Coast to Coast". It airs Friday nights at 11pm Eastern, and 10pm Central. (the words "Shameless Self Promotion" flash at bottom of screen while he plugs his show) Alrighty! We have some interviews with the stars of "The Mask"! Look! Here comes Jim now!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ihh, his mask is better than yours.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Shut your yap, ya stupid cricket. Hello, Jim! Were you followed?

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Uhhhh... No.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Good! Y'know, I just called Zorak a cricket, but he's really a mantis!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Oh really? He's really a mantis. Excellent.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Impersonate me!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: (Does mantis impersonation) This kind of mantis?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Say, that's pretty good!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: I used to love mantises. I used to love to, like, get a mantis and a grasshopper, put them into a jar and shake them up.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: A grass-mantis shake? Now if only we knew where to find a big grasshopper!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Shut up!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Cool. Alright.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey Jim, can you impersonate me?

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: (makes humming-whistling sound effect)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Childish.

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: I love the killer ray, man.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And it loves you!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Really?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes! But love it carefully, it's a very delicate instrument.

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: It doesn't just go off, every once in awhile, and just swat somebody?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Nooo... (his destructo ray goes off, burning Zorak to a crisp)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I... meant to do that.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Eh... uh...

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Oh, man!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He'll live, he always does. So, do you love my mask as well, citizen Mask?

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost's mask is e-, is excellent. But where are the ears, man?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't need 'em. I read lips.

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Excellent.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What? What?! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Cool. Alright.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I hear (get it? hear?) that you can make your heart beat out of your chest. Do it!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Uhhh, that's just really a side effect from the drugs.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Drugs are bad!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Cool. Alright.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I've never taken drugs.

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Quit braggin'!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sorry.

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Alright.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Do you have any words of wisdom to tell the universe?

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: To the universe?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: No, to the universe!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Uhhhh, n-, uhhhh, yeah, um, no.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bye then!

transcript.speaker: Jim Carrey
transcript.dialogue: Cool. Alright.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Whatever. (zaps Jim off monitor)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (still crisped) Emmm... mmmm...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm really sorry, Zorak. I didn't mean to...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ehhh, sure, Space Ghost.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (Pong game is on monitor) It just went off! Really!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Sure it did. Ihhh.

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: (in the control room) Didn't he have a sidekick or something?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: What, you mean those teens? (laughs) They're history!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: That's cool.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: My next guest is Charles Russell! He directed "The Mask"! (Charles appears on monitor) Citizen Charles! Welcome to the show!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: Thank you very much.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That dog was amazing!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) I treated that dog just like my actors.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I can be an actor! I've got the look!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: Oh, well, the yellow cape is good, I like yellow a lot...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Me too!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: We have a nice, banana yellow zoot suit in "Mask".

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bananas are a good source of potassium!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: That's true.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So very, very true!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: (looks at Space Ghost)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So, what about the rest of my suit?

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: It's strong, it's powerful, but I think it's time for Space Ghost to break out.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I like the way you think, Chuck!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: I think I might wanna do something with the wardrobe, I think, oh, I think I might wanna do something, maybe, with a little more color.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You wanna paint me up all green like the "Mask" guy?

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: The truth, though, is that Jim Carrey actually is green.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak is green... with evil!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: I think having an evil bandleader is always a plus, because it gives you that special edge to the music.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, whatever. We're not here to talk about music, Chuck. We're here to talk about me, and my new talk show on the Cartoon Network, which airs Friday nights at 11pm Eastern Standard Time! ("Shameless Self Promotion" flashes at bottom of screen again)

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: Although, Space Ghost, I must say that I've enjoyed some of your earlier work in particular...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That was nothin'! I was typecast!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: But, Tex, Tex Avery, uh... Chuck Jones...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Those guys are old school! I was typecast! Don't you get that?!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: (looks back in silence)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I kept getting super-hero parts, saving galaxies... I wanted more heroic roles! Like... like Lassie!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: Uh, I've always been bored with Lassie, who...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bored with Lassie?! Lassie's king!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah! Lassie's king!

transcript.speaker: Charles Russell
transcript.dialogue: Did he have a sidekick or something?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (under his breath) Lassie-hater.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Normally, I'd ask you if you had any final words for the universe, but we're out of time for you, because now I must plug my show! "Space Ghost Coast to Coast" airs only on The Cartoon Network! ("Shameless Self Promotion" flashes at bottom of screen again) Friday nights at 11pm Eastern, 10pm Central, 9pm Mountain, uh, 8pm Pacific, Greenwich Mean Time would be... in Taiwan, 2pm in Honolulu, 11:45 in London, backtracking across the International Dateline... Are we on in Guam? Somebody tell me, are we on in Guam?
